name: Superbru
description:
Superbru is a Predictor and Fantasy sports gaming platform. It's free, fun and competitive. Follow sport with friends or workmates in private leagues. Play on our app or on the web.

Superbru covers 80+ tournaments per year including the English Premier League, European leagues, Champions League, NFL, Rugby Championship and much more. Football, rugby, cricket, golf, motorsport, rugby league, American football, Australian Rules tennis, rugby sevens and cycling are covered.

Take on sports fans from around the world, and for the most fun challenge your friends or office colleagues in private leagues.

Superbru is 100% free to use, but if you choose to upgrade to Superbru Premium, you will benefit from:

- An ad-free experience
- Superbru Insights newsletter with data-driven pick recommendations
- Extra features including weather forecasts
- Superbru Premium look and feel

Subscription length and features: Auto-renewing monthly subscription providing ad-free use of Superbru, Superbru Insights newsletters, Premium look and feel, and extra features (e.g. weather forecasts).

This app is totally free to use. If you choose to upgrade to Superbru Premium, payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price as your initial subscription. You may manage your subscription through Account Settings in the App Store. Auto-renewal may be turned off after purchase by going to Account Settings.

Privacy Policy: https://www.superbru.com/player/privacy_policy.php
